summary: The movie revolves around Munnabhai (Sanjay Dutt) a dreaded but good-hearted underworld don of Mumbai. Once while beating up one of his foes, he sees Komal (Aishwarya Rai) and is so smitten... See full summary »
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Sanjay Dutt|Asad Aleem|Ajay Devgn|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Satish Kaushik|Annu Kapoor|Paresh Rawal|Mukesh Rishi|Ashish Vidyarthi|Shahbaaz Khan|Avtar Gill|Ram Mohan|Navin Nischol|Supriya Karnik|Ali Asgar|Himani Shivpuri|Shashi Kiran|Rajpal Yadav|Vivek Vaswani|Viju Khote|Javed Khan|Razak Khan|Amit Unadkat
title: Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin
